Caller Info: 5025005824 

Caller ID: 502-500-5824 

Caller Name: Daquan Locke 

Caller Email 

Link to Filevine Contact [filevine-link] 

Voicemail Transcription:

 Yes, my name is Aaron Walk. I was calling to try to get it update because I have reached out multiple times and no 1 has called me back or give me any update. The last call I got a guy told me that he would give me an update, but I still get to get a phone call back. Please give me a phone call back at 502-500-5824, thank you very much.
episodes.natural_language:
Case Daquan-Locke-MVA-6-11-2024 involves client Daquan Locke. A missed call for Aaron Whaley was logged on 2025-10-14 17:09:04.169000+00:00, tagged as #missedcall. The caller information shows the number 502-500-5824, with the caller name listed as Daquan Locke and no email address on file. A Filevine contact link is available here: [filevine-link].

Voicemail transcription reads: "Yes, my name is Aaron Walk. I was calling to try to get it update because I have reached out multiple times and no 1 has called me back or give me any update. The last call I got a guy told me that he would give me an update, but I still get to get a phone call back. Please give me a phone call back at 502-500-5824, thank you very much." This indicates the caller identified as Aaron Walk and requested an update after multiple attempts, noting that a prior caller promised an update but no callback was received, and requesting a return call at the same number.

episodes.original_body:
Case: Daquan-Locke-MVA-6-11-2024
Client: Daquan Locke

__Daquan Locke__
From: Aaron Whaley [agwhaley@whaleylawfirm.com](mailto:agwhaley@whaleylawfirm.com)
To: Justin Chumbley [Justin@whaleylawfirm.com](mailto:Justin@whaleylawfirm.com), Daquan Locke - Filevine Project Email Address [DaquanLockeMVAZ5161382@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com](mailto:DaquanLockeMVAZ5161382@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com)
Date: Thu Oct 23 2025 02:34:56 GMT-04:00

You sent the demand to Progressive, Dayquan was in the car with Tasia Key,
but Tasia Key was at fault. So we got settlements for everybody else
against Shelter, which is Tasia Key's coverage. So you need to add the
claim information for Shelter that's in the other ones, and then send the
demand to Shelter, because that's the real B.I.

-- 
Aaron Whaley
Whaley Law Firm
712 Lyndon Ln
Louisville, KY 40222
502-583-4022
episodes.natural_language:
Case: Daquan-Locke-MVA-6-11-2024. Client: Daquan Locke.

In an email corresponding to this case, dated October 23, 2025 at 02:34:56 GMT-04:00, from Aaron Whaley of Whaley Law Firm, the message was sent to Justin Chumbley and the Daquan Locke Filevine project email address. The email states that the demand had been sent to Progressive, and that Daquan Locke was in the car with Tasia Key, but Tasia Key was at fault. As a result, settlements were obtained for everybody else against Shelter, which is Tasia Key’s insurance coverage. The writer instructs that the claim information for Shelter, which is present in the other files, needs to be added, and then the demand should be sent to Shelter because that is the real B.I.

The signature block identifies the sender as Aaron Whaley of the Whaley Law Firm, including the firm’s address at 712 Lyndon Ln, Louisville, KY 40222, and the contact number 502-583-4022.
episodes.author: Aaron Whaley

about.relevance: demand was sent to this insurer
at-fault driver's insurer; settlements obtained against Shelter; target for demand
primary bodily injury claim to be sent to Shelter
